name: ILS Heart Sensor (MAX30100)
description: Measure heart rate and blood oxygen (SpO2) with MAX30100 pulse oximetry sensor. Perfect for health monitoring and fitness projects!
author: ILS

features.heart_rate: Measures heart rate in beats per minute (BPM)
features.dual_mode: Heart rate only mode or combined HR + SpO2 mode

usage_notes.placement: Place finger gently on sensor, do not press too hard

normal_values.spo2: 95-100% is normal, below 90% may indicate issues

usage_notes.led_current: Start with 11 mA, increase if readings are weak

examples.name: Simple Heart Rate Monitor
examples.description: Display heart rate on OLED screen

examples.name: Health Dashboard
examples.description: Show heart rate, SpO2, and temperature

examples.name: Alert System
examples.description: Buzzer alert when heart rate is too high/low

examples.name: Data Logger
examples.description: Record heart rate and SpO2 over time
